oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On the computational power of enhanced mobile membranes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KRISHNA, SN
CIOBANU, G
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The enhanced mobile membranes is a variant of membrane systems which has been proposed for describing some biological mechanisms of the immune system. In this paper, we study the computational power of the enhanced mobile membranes. In particular, we focus on the power of mobility given by the operations endo, exo, fendo and fexo. The computational universality is obtained with 12 membranes, while systems with 8 membranes subsume ET0L, and those with 3 membranes are contained in MAT.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 4th Conference on Computability in Europe (CiE 2008),Athens, GREECE,JUN 15-20, 2008
